languages.text: "Эй, груда говна! Да, ашмаг ты тупой, ты!" {n}Джай Хейдари выглядит под стать своей грубой речи: взъерошенная, грязная, растерявшая большую часть украшений и весь щегольской лоск. Во взгляде, обращенном к монстру-привратнику, плещется отчаяние и ярость, а голос... голос звучит лающе и глухо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Эй, груда говна! Да, ашмаг ты тупой, ты!" {n}Знакомый голос заставляет вас обернуться. Джай Хейдари, появившаяся из сумрака за вашей спиной, выглядит под стать своей грубой речи: взъерошенная, грязная, растерявшая большую часть украшений и весь щегольской лоск. Во взгляде, обращенном к монстру-привратнику, плещется отчаяние и ярость, а голос... голос звучит лающе и глуше.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hey, you pile of hot dung! Yeah, you, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking to you!" {n}Jae Heydari's looks match her coarse speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of all her jewellery and rakish glamour. Her eyes, locked on the gatekeeping monster, are brimming with fury and desperation, and her voice... her voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Эй, груда говна! Да, ашмаг ты тупой, ты!" {n}Джай Хейдари выглядит под стать своей грубой речи: взъерошенная, грязная, растерявшая большую часть украшений и весь щегольской лоск. Во взгляде, обращенном к монстру-привратнику, плещется отчаяние и ярость, а голос... голос звучит лающе и глухо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hey, you pile of shit! Yes, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking about you!" {n}Jae Heydari looks to match her rude speech: dishevelled, dirty, bereft of the jewellery and foppish glibness. The gaze turned toward the abomination is brimming with fury and desperation, and the voice... The voice sounds barking and gruff.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hey, you pile of shit! Yes, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking about you!" {n}A familiar voice makes you turn around. None other than Jae Heydari has emerged from the gloom behind your back, and she looks to match her rude speech: dishevelled, dirty, bereft of the jewellery and foppish glibness. The gaze turned toward the abomination is brimming with fury and desperation, and the voice... The voice sounds barking and gruff.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hey, you pile of hot shit! Yes, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking about you!" {n}Jae Heydari looks match her rude speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of the jewellery and foppish glitz. The gaze turned towards the gatekeeping monster is brimming with fury and desperation, and the voice... The tone of voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hey, you pile of hot shit! Yes, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking about you!" {n}Jae Heydari looks match her rude speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of the jewellery and foppish glitz. The gaze turned towards the gatekeeping monster is brimming with fury and desperation, and the voice... The tone of voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}

Her eyes, locked on the gatekeeping monster, are brimming with fury and desperation, and her voice... her voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hey, you pile of hot dung! Yeah, you, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking to you!" {n}Jae Heydari's looks match her coarse speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of all her jewellery and rakish glamour. Her eyes, locked on the gatekeeping monster, are brimming with fury and desperation, and her voice... her voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「おい、クソ野郎！そう、あんただよ、アッシュマグ、あんたに言ってるんだ！」{n}ジェイ・ヘイダリはその無作法な話し方に違わず、身なりは乱れ、ボロボロで、宝飾品のようなきらびやかな魅力はない。門番の怪物にガッチリ向けられた視線は怒りと絶望に満ち、その声のトーンは荒々しく吠えているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, you pile of hot dung! Yeah, you, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking to you!" {n}Jae Heydari's looks match her coarse speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of all her jewellery and rakish glamour. Her eyes, locked on the gatekeeping monster, are brimming with fury and desperation, and her voice... her voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「おい、クソ野郎！そう、あんただよ、アッシュマグ、あんたに言ってるんだ！」{n}ジェイ・ヘイダリはその無作法な話し方に違わず、身なりは乱れ、ボロボロで、宝飾品のようなきらびやかな魅力はない。門番の怪物にガッチリ向けられた視線は怒りと絶望に満ち、その声のトーンは荒々しく吠えているかのようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “嘿，你这坨臭狗屎！没错，就是你，你这个坏种！我说的就是你！”{n}婕伊·海达利粗鲁的话语与她邋遢的外表很相配。她蓬头垢面，邋里邋遢，没有任何珠宝首饰，也失去了原本浮华的做派。她的目光死死地盯着看门的怪物，充满了愤怒与绝望，而她的声音……听起来就像粗暴的吠叫一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, you pile of hot dung! Yeah, you, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking to you!" {n}Jae Heydari's looks match her coarse speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of all her jewellery and rakish glamour. Her eyes, locked on the gatekeeping monster, are brimming with fury and desperation, and her voice... her voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “嘿，你这坨臭狗屎！没错，就是你，你这个坏种！我说的就是你！”{n}婕伊·海达利粗鲁的话语与她邋遢的外表很相配。她蓬头垢面，邋里邋遢，没有任何珠宝首饰，也失去了原本浮华的做派。她看着守门怪物的目光充满了愤怒与绝望，她的声音……听起来就像粗暴的吠叫一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Eh, montón de estiércol caliente! Sí, tú, ashmag imbécil, ¡te hablo a ti!». {n}Jae Heydari tiene un aspecto a juego con su ruda forma de hablar: desaliñado, andrajoso y desprovisto de joyas y adornos. La mirada dirigida hacia el monstruo guardián de la puerta rebosa furia y desesperación, y la voz... El tono de voz se asemeja a un ladrido ronco.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, you pile of hot dung! Yeah, you, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking to you!" {n}Jae Heydari's looks match her coarse speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of all her jewellery and rakish glamour. Her eyes, locked on the gatekeeping monster, are brimming with fury and desperation, and her voice... her voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Eh, montón de mierda! ¡Sí, estúpido ashmag, te hablo a ti!». {n}Jae Heydari tiene un aspecto a juego con sus groseras palabras: desaliñado, andrajoso y desprovisto de joyas y adornos vanidosos. La mirada que dirige al monstruoso guardián rebosa furia y desesperación, y su voz... es más bien un ladrido ronco.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hey, Ihr dampfender Haufen Dung! Ja, Ihr dämlicher Ashmag, ich meine Euch!" {n}Jae Heydaris Aussehen passt zu Ihrer groben Ausdrucksweise: Zerzaust, zerlumpt und ihres Schmucks und liderlichen Glamours beraubt. Ihre auf das Monster am Tor fixierten Augen funkeln gleichermaßen zornig wie verzweifelt und ihre Stimme ... gleicht einem schroffen Bellen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, you pile of hot dung! Yeah, you, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking to you!" {n}Jae Heydari's looks match her coarse speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of all her jewellery and rakish glamour. Her eyes, locked on the gatekeeping monster, are brimming with fury and desperation, and her voice... her voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hey, Ihr Haufen dampfende Scheiße! Ja, Ihr dummer Ashmag, ich meine Euch!" {n}Jae Heydaris Aussehen passt zu Ihrer groben Ausdrucksweise: Zerzaust, zerlumpt und des Schmucks und geckenhaften Prunks beraubt. Der Blick, mit dem sie das Monster an der Tür ansieht, ist voller Zorn und Verzweiflung, und die Stimme ... Die Stimme ist ein grobes Bellen.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Hé, espèce de gros tas de bouse ! Ouais, toi, l'ashmag ! C'est à toi que je cause ! » {n}L'apparence de Jae Heydari fait écho à sa grossièreté : débraillée et dénuée de toute extravagance ou de bijoux tape-à-l'œil. Le regard qu'elle adresse au monstre déborde de fureur et de désespoir. Quant à sa voix... elle a tout d'un aboiement abrupt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, you pile of hot dung! Yeah, you, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking to you!" {n}Jae Heydari's looks match her coarse speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of all her jewellery and rakish glamour. Her eyes, locked on the gatekeeping monster, are brimming with fury and desperation, and her voice... her voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Hé, espèce de gros tas de merde ! Ouais, toi, l'ashmag ! C'est à toi que je parle ! » {n}L'apparence de Jae Heydari fait écho à sa grossièreté : débraillée et dénuée de toute extravagance ou de bijoux tape-à-l'œil. Le regard qu'elle adresse au monstre déborde de fureur et de désespoir. Quant à sa voix... Sa voix est plus proche de l'aboiement qu'autre chose.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Seni leş kokulu artık, bak buraya! Evet, sen! Seninle konuşuyorum beyinsiz külboğaz!" {n}Jae Heydari'nin görünümü, kaba saba konuşmasına pek uygun: Saçı başı karışmış, kir pas içinde ve mücevheratıyla şık cazibesinden yoksun kalmış. Öfke ve çaresizlikle dolup taşan bakışları, kapıyı koruyan canavara kilitlenmiş. Sesiyse... Boğuk bir havlamayı andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hey, you pile of hot dung! Yeah, you, you dumb ashmag, I'm talking to you!" {n}Jae Heydari's looks match her coarse speech: dishevelled, ratty, and bereft of all her jewellery and rakish glamour. Her eyes, locked on the gatekeeping monster, are brimming with fury and desperation, and her voice... her voice resembles a gruff bark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seni leş kokulu çöp yığını, buraya baksana! Evet, sen! Seninle konuşuyorum beyinsiz külboğaz!" {n}Jae Heydari'nin görüntüsü, kaba saba konuşmalarından beklenecek bir hâlde. Saçı başı karışmış, kir pas içinde ve mücevheratıyla şık cazibesinden yoksun kalmış. Öfke ve çaresizlikle dolup taşan bakışları, kapıyı koruyan canavara kilitlenmiş. Sesiyse... Sesi boğuk bir havlamayı andırıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
